name: RUINED
description:
RUINED is an exploration-centric RPG with rogue-like elements!

Each day, you wake up to a world swarmed with monsters. As you explore and defeat enemies, the day will pass and night will come. But, it will never go. The morning only comes when you go back to sleep, or die. As the night progresses, more and more monsters will appear growing stronger and stronger. However, you are not alone in this world. Some enemies will drop seeds that allow you to grow your own monsters, identical in every way except fighting with you, rather than against! Forge your army, explore the mysterious mountains, and find why the world is RUINED!

Features

  • Explore a vast range of biomes as you journey across and under the mountains!

  • Create an army of monsters to fight alongside you and vanquish the enemies in your path!

  • Sprint home before darkness falls or face the unyielding wrath of the endless night!

  • Find lost companions scattered throughout the world to rebuild society and help you in your quest!

  • Secrets and mysteries behind every corner in this lovingly hand-crafted world!
